title: English Language - Beginner
description: Test your basic English grammar and vocabulary skills

questions.question: What is the past tense of 'go'?
Which word is a noun?
questions.explanation: A noun is a person, place, or thing. 'Book' is a thing.

questions.question: Choose the correct article: '__ apple'
questions.explanation: 'An' is used before words that start with a vowel sound.

questions.question: What is the plural of 'child'?
questions.explanation: 'Children' is the irregular plural form of 'child'.

questions.question: Which sentence is correct?
questions.explanation: For third person singular, use 'doesn't' (does not).

questions.question: Choose the correct pronoun: 'John and __ went to the store.'
questions.explanation: 'I' is the subject pronoun used when the pronoun is the subject of the sentence.

questions.question: Which word rhymes with 'cat'?
questions.explanation: 'Hat' rhymes with 'cat' - both end with the '-at' sound.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'I __ a student.'
questions.explanation: With 'I', we use 'am' - 'I am a student'.
